Articles.Content: I can't seem to find any external camera mods compatible with Raster Prop Monitor. I'm sure they exist, can someone point me to one?
[Hullcam VDS](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/46365) has several cameras, and [ALCOR](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925) comes with one as well.

And even JSI has a camera and FASA has one and CCTV [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107397-Kerbal-CCTV-1-1-now-with-WiFi-came](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107397-Kerbal-CCTV-1-1-now-with-WiFi-came)
